root.name: Dragon Riders: Chronicles of Pern
root.description: OverviewDragon Riders Chronicles Of Pern is an adventure game that was released Aug 9th 2001 US and Feb 8th 2002 PAL on the Sega Dreamcast and Aug 12th 2001 on the PC. Developed by Ubi Studios UK and Published by Ubisoft. StoryDragon Riders Chronicles Of Pern takes from the Chronicles Of Pern novels that were written by Anne McCaffrey. Set on the planet of Pern. The story, divided into four chapters, follows the dragonrider D'kor who with the help of Zenth D'kor's dragon, where they search for girls who will be candidates for a new golden dragon. The story sometimes diverts into sub-plots that do not keep well to the story at all.
